welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Diest, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture, rich history, and warm hospitality. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all that our city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Zoersel Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Liege Airport, primarily used for cargo and private flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kempen Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kempen Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
